page.title: 15AN ADULT'S DAY
page.content: THIS WAS WRITTEN BY A SECOND YEAR PUPIL AT THE DIDCOT GIRLS' SCHOOL. ON HEARING THE ALARM CLOCK,MY PARENTS GET DRESSED AND RUSH DOWN FOR BREAKFAST AND THE NEWSPAPER.AFTER BREAKFAST,THEY KISS THE FAMILY GOOD-BYE AND RUSH TO CATCH THE BUS TO WORK.MY FATHER WORKS AT CULHAM LABORATORY AS A CIVIL ENGINEER.HE DESIGNS AND SURVEYS BUILDINGS AND DRAINING.DURING LUNCH-TIME, HE RELAXES PLAYING PUTTING ON THE GREENS AT CULHAM.AT 5P.M. HE RETURNS AND EATS TEA.AFTER WATCHING THE NEWS,HE GOES INTO THE GARDEN AND OCCASIONALLY PLAYS BOWLS IN A NEIGHBOURING VILLAGE.HE USUALLY GOES TO BED AT 10 P.M. AFTER A DAY'S WORK.
